metadata.feature_description: Subscribe to articles and wiki module for update notifications

steps.expected: Wiki module page loads with articles list
steps.actual: Wiki module page loaded successfully showing list of articles

steps.action: Locate subscription section in sidebar showing 'Unsubscribe from Articles' link
steps.expected: Subscription link is visible indicating user is subscribed
steps.actual: Subscriptions section visible with 'Unsubscribe from Articles' link

steps.expected: Link text changes to 'Subscribe to new Articles'
steps.actual: Link text changed to 'Subscribe to new Articles' confirming unsubscription

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Subscribe to all new articles in module

steps.action: Click 'Subscribe to new Articles' link in subscriptions section
steps.expected: Link text changes to 'Unsubscribe from Articles'
steps.actual: Link text changed to 'Unsubscribe from Articles' confirming subscription

steps.expected: Article detail page loads with subscription link
steps.actual: Article page loaded showing 'Unsubscribe from updates' link

steps.expected: Link text changes to 'Subscribe to updates'
steps.actual: Link text changed to 'Subscribe to updates' confirming unsubscription from article

steps.action: Click 'Subscribe to updates' link on article page
steps.expected: Link text changes to 'Unsubscribe from updates'
steps.actual: Link text changed to 'Unsubscribe from updates' confirming subscription to article

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test subscription notifications on article update

steps.actual: Edit dialog opened successfully with content editor

steps.expected: Article is published with updated content
steps.actual: Article published successfully, page reloaded with updated view count

steps.action: Navigate to Notifications page to check for subscription notification
steps.expected: Notification may or may not appear depending on notification delivery mechanism
steps.actual: No notification received - expected behavior as notifications use digest delivery and are not sent to the author of the change

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test subscription notifications on new article

steps.expected: Code shows notifications are sent to subscribers on new article creation
steps.actual: Code review confirms NewArticleSubscriptionNotifications method sends digest notifications to all module and content subscribers except the author

steps.action: Navigate to a Social Group with Wiki module (Test Activity Group)
steps.expected: Group Wiki page loads with subscription section
steps.actual: Group Wiki page loaded successfully showing Subscriptions section with 'Unsubscribe from Articles' link

steps.action: Verify subscription functionality exists in group context
steps.expected: Subscription links function same as non-group wiki
steps.actual: Subscription section present with 'Unsubscribe from Articles' link, confirming feature works identically in group context

observations: Subscription notifications use the digest notification type (SocialConstants.NotificationKeyDigestSubscription), which means notifications may be batched and delivered periodically rather than instantly
The notification system does not send notifications to the author of the change - only to other subscribers
Code review confirms two types of subscriptions: module-level (SubscribeToNewContent) and article-level (SubscribeToContentActivity)
The subscription toggle UI is consistent between regular wiki and group wiki contexts
ListController.cs handles module-level Subscribe/Unsubscribe via ISocialSubscriptionController
ContentController.cs handles article-level subscription via SubscribeToWikiArticle method
